Text.Page:
Mission Orders

We must weaken the Scions of Lok by killing their defenders.

Take out {@LinkCreature:7#12#Lokian lancers} and {@LinkCreature:7#13#berserkers} in the Cardovek Remnants, and report to Zandra in Lumbertown when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to us all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
